summary: Email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to defense counsel regarding a supplemental discovery production in the case US v. Maxwell. The email indicates the production will be made available via USAfx and loaded onto a drive for Ghislaine Maxwell at the MDC.

persons.name: Bobbi Stemheim
persons.context: Recipient of the email regarding discovery production in US v. Maxwell.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Recipient of the email regarding discovery production in US v. Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Recipient of the email regarding discovery production in US v. Maxwell.

persons.name: Chris
persons.context: Mentioned as the person who will drop off a drive at the AUSA's office for loading the discovery production.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in US v. Maxwell, for whom the discovery production is being sent to the MDC.

connections.description: Stemheim is defense counsel receiving discovery materials for the defendant, Maxwell.
Menninger is defense counsel receiving discovery materials for the defendant, Maxwell.
Pagliuca is defense counsel receiving discovery materials for the defendant, Maxwell.
Chris is coordinating the physical transfer of a drive containing discovery from the AUSA's office.

events.title: Discovery Letter Issued
events.description: A cover letter (2021.11.09_Maxwell Discovery_Letter.pdf) was issued regarding supplemental discovery production in US v. Maxwell.

events.title: Discovery Production and Transfer
events.description: The prosecution makes a supplemental discovery production to defense counsel and arranges for it to be loaded onto a drive for delivery to Ghislaine Maxwell at the MDC.

keyFacts: The prosecution in US v. Maxwell was actively producing supplemental discovery to the defense as of November 2021.
Discovery materials were being transferred both electronically (USAfx) and physically via a drive for the incarcerated defendant, Ghislaine Maxwell.
The defense team at this time included attorneys Bobbi Stemheim, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca.
Ghislaine Maxwell was detained at the MDC (Metropolitan Detention Center) during this phase of the legal proceedings.
The correspondence demonstrates ongoing pre-trial evidence sharing between the prosecution and defense.
